alert.note: Alert for Morehouse; West Carroll (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 11 at 12:24PM CDT until May 11 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL MOREHOUSE...NORTHEASTERN RICHLAND AND WEST CARROLL PARISHES... At 1223 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Oak Ridge, or 14 miles northeast of Rayville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Goodwill around 1235 PM CDT. Darnell around 1240 PM CDT. Pioneer around 1245 PM CDT. Forest around 1250 PM CDT. Oak Grove around 1255 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for northeastern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
